author: pdobacz
content: Pleased to announce EOF EEST release v.2.2.0 https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/eip7692%40v2.2.0. There's a lot of new tests and changes (notably, being based on top of proper pectra-devnet-6 spec). Pls report back with whether your client passes the tests (state, blockchain & eof) here or at https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/blob/main/spec/implementation_matrix.md#testing-readiness-matrix
